description: Self-learning knowledge base about Swiss labor market and AI impact, with MCP server for AI agents

stories.title: Project Setup
stories.description: Initialize Node.js project with TypeScript, proper folder structure, and dependencies
acceptance_criteria: package.json with dependencies: ruvector, @modelcontextprotocol/sdk, typescript, tsx, dotenv
Folder structure: src/, data/, scripts/, dashboard/

stories.title: ruVector Integration
stories.description: Install and configure ruVector for vector storage and graph queries
acceptance_criteria: src/db/ruvector.ts with init, insert, search, query functions

stories.title: Embedding Pipeline
stories.description: Create pipeline to chunk, embed, and store documents
acceptance_criteria: Support for markdown, text, and JSON documents

stories.title: BFS Data Collector
stories.description: Collect employment data from Bundesamt fÃ¼r Statistik
acceptance_criteria: src/collectors/bfs.ts - fetch BFS data via their API or web scraping
Collect: employment by sector, unemployment by canton, wage statistics

stories.title: News Collector
stories.description: Collect AI-related labor market news from Swiss sources
acceptance_criteria: Filter for AI + labor market keywords
Ingest into ruVector with source attribution

stories.title: Web Research Collector
stories.description: Collect research and reports about AI impact on Swiss jobs
acceptance_criteria: Sources: Google Scholar, ETH research, UBS/CS reports

stories.title: Entity Extraction
stories.description: Extract entities from documents for graph relationships
acceptance_criteria: src/graph/entities.ts - extract industries, jobs, skills, locations
Use LLM or regex patterns for extraction
Store entities as graph nodes in ruVector

stories.title: AI Impact Scoring
stories.description: Calculate AI impact scores for industries and job roles
acceptance_criteria: Factors: automation potential, AI mentions, job trend
Store scores in graph with relationships
Update scores when new data arrives

stories.title: MCP Server Setup
stories.description: Create MCP server for AI agent integration

stories.title: MCP Search Tool
acceptance_criteria: Filter by industry, canton, timeframe, source_type
Returns snippets with sources and confidence

stories.title: MCP AI Impact Tool
acceptance_criteria: Lists affected roles or required skills

stories.description: Create web interface for exploring the knowledge base
acceptance_criteria: AI impact explorer with industry cards
